storyInfo: Secunda interrogates a Cultist who attacked the lab. After their surgery, the Hunters leave the city. Ulpianus tells the Doctor more about the operation that first slew Ishar'mla.

attributes.content: Sea Patrol. Here to interrogate me?
attributes.name: Wounded 'Researcher'

attributes.content: 'Interrogate.' Ha. I never thought I'd have anything to do with that word.
attributes.name: Wounded 'Researcher'

attributes.content: You should have thought of that when you intruded on the lab.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: What about before then? What makes you and I so different?
attributes.name: Wounded 'Researcher'

attributes.content: Why 'interrogate' me? What have I done to deserve being 'questioned'?
attributes.name: Wounded 'Researcher'

attributes.content: At times like these, I feel like our methods are too gentle.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: According to our envoy from Iberia, they're more than happy to incorporate punishment into the process.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: So if you're finished talking nonsense, state your identity.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: I'm a former road-side coral breeder.
attributes.name: Wounded 'Researcher'

attributes.content: Motive?
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: You ever paid close attention to the coral by the road, Patroller?
attributes.name: Wounded 'Researcher'

attributes.content: We hoped every cluster on every street would take on a different form or color, even different capabilities.
attributes.name: Wounded 'Researcher'

attributes.content: Transport tubes pass through the cavity-filled cluster on the east side of the Sophontheatrum, and under the glimmering tubes, the polyps glimmer back. A patchwork of dots of light...
attributes.name: Wounded 'Researcher'

attributes.content: Like a nebula in miniature.
attributes.name: Wounded 'Researcher'

attributes.content: Then there's the ones around the portâ€”
attributes.name: Wounded 'Researcher'

attributes.content: As it happens, I have been paying close attention to some road-side coral recently. Specifically, the ones growing in your experimental field.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Where an innocent data scientist died.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Her dreams, her obsession, her love for her seaweeds... were as beautiful as the coral you speak of.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: But you murdered her.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: You asked a good question earlier. What makes you and her so different?
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: So why are you still alive? What did she do to deserve death?
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: She found...
attributes.name: Wounded 'Researcher'

attributes.content: Found what? Speak up.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Or are you implying I should be asking Cassia this question?
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Wounded 'Researcher'

attributes.content: What is the Church planning against the Waterway Program?
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Will you be attacking the beacon, or the weapons?
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Speak.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: *sigh* Church this, cultist that.
attributes.name: Wounded 'Researcher'

attributes.content: I'm still not used to being called names like that. You sure they're not just convenient excuses for you to arrest people?
attributes.name: Wounded 'Researcher'

attributes.content: This so-called 'Church' and its 'cultists.' What part of them is 'holy,' exactly?
attributes.name: Wounded 'Researcher'

attributes.content: I don't worship any kind of imaginary entity. I just agree with how Cassia sees things.
attributes.name: Wounded 'Researcher'

attributes.content: From the despair engulfing Ã†gir, she can see this nation's fragile nature.
attributes.name: Wounded 'Researcher'

attributes.content: People place too much importance on the value of things, but are unwilling to recognize how fickle these values really are. They've become worshipers at their altar.
attributes.name: Wounded 'Researcher'

attributes.content: But now, those values are crumbling away. Before Ã†gir falls completely into despair, someone must sound the alarmâ€”
attributes.name: Wounded 'Researcher'

attributes.content: Perii! You're just trying to loosen my lips!
attributes.name: Wounded 'Researcher'

attributes.content: You won't get another word out of me. If you're feeling impatient, go ahead, scan my brainwaves. You won't get anything out of that eitherâ€”
attributes.name: Wounded 'Researcher'

attributes.content: Questioning you is the last respect I'll give you as a human being, scumbag!
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Maybe you believe yourself innocent, and your actions free of conspiracy. But you will tell me everything I want to know.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Now speak.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Captain.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: It's almost time for us to leave, Skadi.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: I know it's urgent.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: The frontline is barely holding ground against the Seaborn. The loss of two entire fleets is really hitting us hard now.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: According to their most recent missive, Legions VIII and X failed to regroup into formation, and they are now mired in a bitter struggle.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: If the beacon cannot be deployed at the designated position within the nest, and the deadlock continues... it will mean the failure of the Waterway Program.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: The Legion fleets are about to launch an offensive across the entire front, at all costs. All to attract the Seaborn's attention. As for usâ€”
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Squeeze through the battlefield, infiltrate the nest, and deploy the beacon.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Correct. How would you rate your current condition, Skadi?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: I got some good sleep, at least. My first dreamless sleep since our last campaign.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: The situation in the city is getting more restive... Do you know where the Doctor has gone?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: (Shakes head)
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: I know you want me to keep the peace and protect the Doctor, Captain... You want me to stay.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: To be honest, I am conflicted.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Cleansing the sea of its dregs is our duty, but I am also responsible for your safety.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Have there been any signs of Ishar'mla stirring since we returned to sea?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: If it has, it's been real quiet.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: If it speaks up, I'll shut it up.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Actually, I've got something to say to you, Captain.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: We've never been this cautious in our work before. We had our ways of handling this sort of thing.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: If the Church's godâ€”the one the scum call 'Ishar'mla'â€”really is inside me, then if I ever go out of control, I want you to execute me on the spot. Simple as that.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: My heart's right here. I trust you won't miss.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Skadiâ€”
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: I'm not finished.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: If you or Shark start to fall under their influence in battle before I do, I won't hesitate either.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: What I was going to say is that, with war close at hand, I can imagine nothing more reassuring to hear.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Let's go.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Miss Laurentina.
No need for that dreary honorific, little bird. We're not strangers, are we?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: ...Laurentina.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Considering how long we've been in this city, I'm surprised this is the first time we've run into one another. This is sad.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: I've always wanted to take our brave little warrior out on a real hunt in the depths. Sadly, the nest we're headed to is too far and too deep. No way to bring you along.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: It's alright. Even if I had the option, I'd stay in Milliarium regardless.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: There's been a lot happening in the city lately.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: The first time I wore deep-water equipment and entered the ocean, I was immediately knocked about by the current. I hate to admit it, but I'd be dead weight out there.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: No need to talk like that. The first time is always rough.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Anyway, I can do a lot more in the city than in that nest.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: And once you've completed your mission and Ã†gir's weapon systems start cleansing the area, I'll have to return to Saint Carmen and make an urgent report on why the sea surface has changed.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Ah, so you meant we were to be parted once more.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: I'd be offering you all farewell gifts, but I wasn't expecting this before we left for Milliarium, so I have nothing to give.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Don't worry about it. We'll meet again.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: While we won't be needing to drag you from the sea half-drowned this time, I have a feeling our next reunion will be unforgettable in its own right.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: *cough*! ...Oh, look, Skadi and Gladiia are coming!
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Take care of yourself, Laurentina.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Finished with your chat?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: It's past time we left, Hunters.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Doctor.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.options: Seems you got the evidence you wanted.

attributes.content: Yes. You've been of great assistance.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.options: So, what's the verdict?;Not going to fill me in?

attributes.content: As previously mentioned, there are unusual data interactions between the beacon within the city and the ones deployed in the nests.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: It seems the bulk of the work was handled by Lab C-22. Namely, the facility we just infiltrated.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: While I do not fully understand the principles behind the beacon system or the Class IV weapons, the contents of these interactions can still be inferred.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: The coordination between the beacons and the weapons has been altered.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: As I surmised, the Waterway Program has been infiltrated at the highest level.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.options: 'As I surmised.';Did you doubt the program from the start?

attributes.content: Correct.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Even before it was conceived, I had my doubts about Ã†gir.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: ...That decisive campaign.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.options: You were meant to kill the Firstborn.
But you lost contact with your team.
Skadi was left to take the burden.

attributes.content: ...So you already know.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Skadi trusts you more than expected.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.options: I put it together from what she said.;She's not sure what happened herself.

attributes.content: My dereliction was due to a moment of distraction.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: In a cave, or rather, a cavity closest to Ishar'mla's core, I noticed something that should not be there.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Crude piles of meat, turbid mucus. At first, I assumed they were nodules of its body, but then I saw clearly the measuring scales and flow channels around them...
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: A corroded water flow meter.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: One from Ã†gir. A design hundreds of years old, one that now exists only in museums.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Based on the degradation, it had sat within Ishar'mla's body for two centuries.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: But I had been told that no other Ã†gir had ever managed to reach the Firstborn before us.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: That is to say, before Ã†gir was even aware of it, its people had secretly come into contact with the Firstborn.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: The undercurrents beneath tranquil Ã†gir are more turbulent than anyone could imagine.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.options: I also found something odd while you were out.
As soon as the Hunters awoke, they left.

attributes.content: They are being used to break the deadlock at the front.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: I can imagine the mission they have been assigned. Bypass the front lines, advance to the nest, and deploy the beacon.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.options: First support, now the linchpin? It's too quick.
The advisor seemed more anxious than them.
He left the lab at the first opportunity.

attributes.content: Blandus.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Then I fear we, too, must act as quickly as possible.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: If the coordination between the beacons and weapons has been tampered with, then there is only one place to go: the core of the Waterway Program. The beacon launcher.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: As for you...
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.options: I'll go see the one who gave the order.
